parameters.name: ExplDirIndex
parameters.description: Explode direction manipulator index as defined in swExplodeDirectionIndex_e ; valid only for regular explode steps

title: IExplodeStep.GetExplodeDirection
description: Gets the explode direction (manipulator index and entity) for this explode step.

parameters.name: ExplDirIndex
parameters.description: Explode direction manipulator index as defined in swExplodeDirectionIndex_e ; valid only for regular explode steps

returns: Explode direction entity; Nothing or null if an explode direction entity was not selected during creation of this explode step
remarks: This method is not valid for subassembly explode steps.
